/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road stretching into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on both sides. The road, a ribbon of gray, cuts through the verdant landscape, disappearing into the horizon. On the right side of the road, a telephone pole stands tall, its wires stretching out into the distance, disappearing into the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions. The relative positions of the objects suggest a peaceful, rural setting, with the road serving as a path leading the viewer's eye towards the horizon.
